var M=Object.defineProperty;var q=(s,e,t)=>e in s?M(s,e,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):s[e]=t;var m=(s,e,t)=>(q(s,typeof e!="symbol"?e+"":e,t),t);(function(){const e=document.createElement("link").relList;if(e&&e.supports&&e.supports("modulepreload"))return;for(const r of document.querySelectorAll('link[rel="modulepreload"]'))i(r);new MutationObserver(r=>{for(const o of r)if(o.type==="childList")for(const h of o.addedNodes)h.tagName==="LINK"&&h.rel==="modulepreload"&&i(h)}).observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});function t(r){const o={};return r.integrity&&(o.integrity=r.integrity),r.referrerPolicy&&(o.referrerPolicy=r.referrerPolicy),r.crossOrigin==="use-credentials"?o.credentials="include":r.crossOrigin==="anonymous"?o.credentials="omit":o.credentials="same-origin",o}function i(r){if(r.ep)return;r.ep=!0;const o=t(r);fetch(r.href,o)}})();gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger,Observer);const y=new Lenis;y.on("scroll",ScrollTrigger.update);gsap.ticker.add(s=>{y.raf(s*1e3)});gsap.ticker.lagSmoothing(0);const _=s=>{let e=s.innerHTML;s.style.overflow="hidden";let i=e.split(/(<br>)/).map(r=>r==="<br>"?null:`<span style="display: inline-block;">${r}</span>`).join(" ");s.innerHTML=i},b=s=>{if(!s)return;s.style.overflow="hidden";const e=s.innerText.split(" i=document.createElement("span");i.innerText=t,s.appendChild(i)}),s};class x{constructor(){this.resize()}navHover(){this.navLinks&&this.navLinks.forEach(e=>{const t=e.dataset.image;if(t){let i;e.addEventListener("mouseover",()=>{clearTimeout(i),this.navImage.src=t,gsap.to([this.navImage,this.navOverlay],{opacity:1,duration:.4})}),e.addEventListener("mouseout",()=>{this.imageState||gsap.to([this.navImage,this.navOverlay],{opacity:0,duration:.4})})}})}hideMenuAnimation(e){return img",{scale:1,yPercent:"50"},"start").to(".scale-grid_item:not(.scale-grid_item-middle)",{opacity:.3},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._1",{x:-50},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._3",{x:50},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._4",{y:50},"start"),ScrollTrigger.create({trigger:t,markers:!1,pin:!0,end:"+=1000",scrub:!0,animation:i})}parallaxImages(){if(!document.querySelector(".three-col_component"))return;gsap.matchMedia().add({isMobile:"screen and (max-width: 767px)",isDesktop:"screen and (min-width: 768px)"},t=>{let{isMobile:i,isDesktop:r}=t.conditions;if(r){const l=gsap.timeline({scrollTrigger:{start:"center center",end:"bottom center",trigger:".three-col_image-wrap.second",scrub:1.5,invalidateOnRefresh:!0,pin:".three-col_component"}});l.to(".three-col_image-wrap.first",{translateY:0,duration:1}),l.to(".three-col_image-wrap.third",{translateY:0,duration:1},"<")}if(i){let d=function(){c&&c.play(0),l&&l.play(0)},u=function(){c&&c.reverse(),l&&l.reverse()};var o=d,h=u;const l=gsap.timeline({paused:!0});l&&l.to(".three-col_image-wrap.first",{translateY:0,duration:1});const c=gsap.timeline({paused:!0});c&&c.to(".three-col_image-wrap.third",{translateY:0,duration:1}),gsap.timeline({scrollTrigger:{start:"center center",end:"bottom center",trigger:".three-col_image-wrap.second",scrub:1.5,invalidateOnRefresh:!0,onEnter:()=>d(),onLeaveBack:()=>u()}})}})}amenitiesAnimation(){this.sectionCutIn(),this.scaleIn(),this.parallaxImages()}init(){this.stephenCustomCode(),this.navAnimation.init(),this.sliders(),this.amenitiesAnimation(),this.footerPageTransition()}}const T=new k;T.init();T.barbaInit();
